overview: It was not raining, but the ground was wet because the water was dripping from the outdoor units of the air conditioners on the towering buildings. The neon lights of Tsim Sha Tsui glittered in the mysteriously shaped puddle. The film is a diary-like film that captures peaceful Hong Kong in 2019, just before the pro-democracy protests against the Fugitive Slave Ordinance intensified.
title: Waterless Island
